thread.title: Girls soccer: Foran defeats Trojans to stay in chase
thread.title_full: Girls soccer: Foran defeats Trojans to stay in chase

author: Milford Mirror
title: Girls soccer: Foran defeats Trojans to stay in chase
text:
By Milford Mirror on October 22, 2015 in High School Sports , Sports Features · 0 Comments 
The Foran High girls soccer team stayed in the chase for a berth in the state tournament with a 2-0 victory over Lyman Hall in Wallingford on Wednesday. 
Coach Casey Blake’s Lions need a win or a tie in one of its last two games. 
Monica Malangone gave Foran a 1-0 halftime lead with Lindsay Broderick getting the assist. 
Hayley Byers made it 2-0, with an unassisted goal. Related posts:
